mapper.select: select outbound_id, employee_id, document, outbound_date, clerk_name, outboud_type, review_date, department, outbound_remark, outbound_creater, outbound_reviewer, outbound_approver, outbound_closer, outbound_state, create_date from accessories_outbound where outbound_id = #{outboundId}
mapper.insert: insert into accessories_outbound(employee_id, document, outbound_date, clerk_name, outboud_type, review_date, department, outbound_remark, outbound_creater, outbound_reviewer, outbound_approver, outbound_closer, outbound_state, create_date) values (#{employeeId}, #{document}, #{outboundDate}, #{clerkName}, #{outboudType}, #{reviewDate}, #{department}, #{outboundRemark}, #{outboundCreater}, #{outboundReviewer}, #{outboundApprover}, #{outboundCloser}, #{outboundState}, #{createDate})

insert into accessories_outbound(employee_id, document, outbound_date, clerk_name, outboud_type, review_date, department, outbound_remark, outbound_creater, outbound_reviewer, outbound_approver, outbound_closer, outbound_state, create_date) values
(#{entity.employeeId}, #{entity.document}, #{entity.outboundDate}, #{entity.clerkName}, #{entity.outboudType}, #{entity.reviewDate}, #{entity.department}, #{entity.outboundRemark}, #{entity.outboundCreater}, #{entity.outboundReviewer}, #{entity.outboundApprover}, #{entity.outboundCloser}, #{entity.outboundState}, #{entity.createDate})

insert into accessories_outbound(employee_id, document, outbound_date, clerk_name, outboud_type, review_date, department, outbound_remark, outbound_creater, outbound_reviewer, outbound_approver, outbound_closer, outbound_state, create_date) values
(#{entity.employeeId}, #{entity.document}, #{entity.outboundDate}, #{entity.clerkName}, #{entity.outboudType}, #{entity.reviewDate}, #{entity.department}, #{entity.outboundRemark}, #{entity.outboundCreater}, #{entity.outboundReviewer}, #{entity.outboundApprover}, #{entity.outboundCloser}, #{entity.outboundState}, #{entity.createDate})
on duplicate key update employee_id = values(employee_id), document = values(document), outbound_date = values(outbound_date), clerk_name = values(clerk_name), outboud_type = values(outboud_type), review_date = values(review_date), department = values(department), outbound_remark = values(outbound_remark), outbound_creater = values(outbound_creater), outbound_reviewer = values(outbound_reviewer), outbound_approver = values(outbound_approver), outbound_closer = values(outbound_closer), outbound_state = values(outbound_state), create_date = values(create_date)
mapper.update:
update accessories_outbound
employee_id = #{employeeId},
document = #{document},
outbound_date = #{outboundDate},
clerk_name = #{clerkName},
outboud_type = #{outboudType},
review_date = #{reviewDate},
department = #{department},
outbound_remark = #{outboundRemark},
outbound_creater = #{outboundCreater},
outbound_reviewer = #{outboundReviewer},
outbound_approver = #{outboundApprover},
outbound_closer = #{outboundCloser},
outbound_state = #{outboundState},
create_date = #{createDate},
where outbound_id = #{outboundId}
